title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:

‚úÖ LAPTOP FRIENDLY: With compatibility for 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3-inch laptops, this backpack ensures your device stays safe and secure during your travels.

üçΩÔ∏è INSULATED COOLER COMPARTMENT: This spacious 11.4" x 5.5" x 6.9" compartment holds up to 10 cans, keeping your food warm and beverages cold for up to 5 hours, thanks to its water-resistant aluminum and high-quality lining material.

üì¶ SPACIOUS STORAGE: The roomy main zipper pocket is perfect for clothes, files, and papers, while the 2 front pockets and 2 side pockets provide easy access to your essentials. Internal organizers with slots and a key hook ensure your belongings stay neatly arranged.

üíß WATER-RESISTANT AND DURABLE: Made from high-density polyester fabric, this backpack is resistant to rips, scratches, and water, ensuring long-lasting use and protection for your belongings.
